chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: BaseParams
labeled_multi_params: LabeledMultiParams P
overlay_params: NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params
fail_msg_params: FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params

Goal:
forall s : infseq (event (list name * ordered_network) label (name * (input + output))), event_step_star step_ordered_failure step_ordered_failure_init (hd s) -> lb_step_execution lb_step_ordered_failure s -> always (now (event_step_star step_ordered_failure step_ordered_failure_init)) s

Premises:
now : forall T : Type, (T -> Prop) -> infseq T -> Prop
Record FailMsgParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailMsgParams { msg_fail : msg } Arguments FailMsgParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailMsgParams [P0]
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record event (A L trace : Type) : Type := Build_event { evt_a : A; evt_l : L; evt_trace : list trace } Arguments event (_ _ _)%type_scope Arguments Build_event [A L trace]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope
Record ordered_network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkONetwork { onwPackets : name -> name -> list msg; onwState : name -> data } Arguments ordered_network {P params} Arguments mkONetwork {P params} (_ _)%function_scope
Record LabeledMultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_LabeledMultiParams { lb_name : Type; lb_msg : Type; lb_msg_eq_dec : forall x y : lb_msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; lb_name_eq_dec : forall x y : lb_name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; lb_nodes : list lb_name; lb_all_names_nodes : forall n : lb_name, In n lb_nodes; lb_no_dup_nodes : NoDup lb_nodes; label : Type; label_silent : label; lb_init_handlers : lb_name -> data; lb_net_handlers : lb_name -> lb_name -> lb_msg -> data -> label * list output * data * list (lb_name * lb_msg); lb_input_handlers
hd : forall T : Type, infseq T -> T
unlabeled_multi_params = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams base_params) => {| name := lb_name; msg := lb_msg; msg_eq_dec := lb_msg_eq_dec; name_eq_dec := lb_name_eq_dec; nodes := lb_nodes; all_names_nodes := lb_all_names_nodes; no_dup_nodes := lb_no_dup_nodes; init_handlers := lb_init_handlers; net_handlers := unlabeled_net_handlers; input_handlers := unlabeled_input_handlers |} : forall base_params : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams base_params -> MultiParams base_params Arguments unlabeled_multi_params {base_params labeled_multi_params}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
event_step_star : forall A L trace : Type, step_relation A trace -> A -> event A L trace -> Prop
step_ordered_failure_init = fun (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) => ([], step_ordered_init) : forall (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P), list name * ordered_network Arguments step_ordered_failure_init {P multi_params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
CoInductive infseq (T : Type) : Type := Cons : T -> infseq T -> infseq T Arguments infseq _%type_scope Arguments Cons [T]%type_scope

always : forall T : Type, (infseq T -> Prop) -> infseq T -> Prop
Inductive lb_step_ordered_failure : lb_step_relation (list name * ordered_network) label (name * (input + output)) := LabeledStepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (from to : name) (lb : label), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> lb_net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Record NameOverlayParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NameOverlayParams { adjacent_to : Relation_Definitions.relation name; adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y}; adjacent_to_symmetric : RelationClasses.Symmetric adjacent_to; adjacent_to_irreflexive : RelationClasses.Irreflexive adjacent_to } Arguments NameOverlayParams {P0} Arguments Build_NameOverlayParams [P0] _ [adjacent_to] _%function_scope
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
label = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, _, _, _, _) := LabeledMultiParams0 in label : forall P : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams P -> Type Arguments label {P LabeledMultiParams}
lb_step_execution : forall A L trace : Type, lb_step_relation A L trace -> infseq (event A L trace) -> Prop
step_failure_star_lb_step_execution : forall s : infseq (event (list name * network) label (name * (input + list output))), event_step_star step_failure step_failure_init (hd s) -> lb_step_execution lb_step_failure s -> always (now (event_step_star step_failure step_failure_init)) s where ?P : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- BaseParams] ?labeled_multi_params : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- LabeledMultiParams ?P] ?failure_params : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- FailureParams unlabeled_multi_params]
step_async_star_lb_step_execution : forall s : infseq (event network label (name * (input + list output))), event_step_star step_async step_async_init (hd s) -> lb_step_execution lb_step_async s -> always (now (event_step_star step_async step_async_init)) s
step_star_lb_step_execution : forall (A L trace : Type) (lb_step : lb_step_relation A L trace) (step : step_relation A trace) (init : A), step_star_lb_step_reachable lb_step step init -> forall s : infseq (event A L trace), event_step_star step init (hd s) -> lb_step_execution lb_step s -> always (now (event_step_star step init)) s
step_ordered_failure_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams multi_params) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_ordered_failure : forall (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P), NameOverlayParams multi_params -> FailMsgParams multi_params -> step_relation (list name * ordered_network) (name * (input + output)) Arguments step_ordered_failure_star {P multi_params overlay_params fail_msg_params}
step_ordered_failure_star_lb_step_reachable = fun _top_assumption_ : list name * ordered_network => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : list name) (b : ordered_network), (fun p : list name * ordered_network => forall (l : label) (a' : list name * ordered_network) (tr tr' : list (name * (input + output))), refl_trans_1n_trace step_ordered_failure step_ordered_failure_init p tr' -> lb_step_ordered_failure p l a' tr -> refl_trans_1n_trace step_ordered_failure step_ordered_failure_init a' (tr' ++ tr)) (a, b) => let (x, x0) as p return ((fun p0 : list name * ordered_network => forall (l : label) (a' : list name * ordered_network) (tr tr' : list (name * (input + output))), refl_trans_1n_trace step_ordered_failure step_ordered_failure_init p0 tr' -> lb_step...
lb_step_execution_invar : forall (A L trace : Type) (step : lb_step_relation A L trace) (x : event A L trace) (s : infseq (event A L trace)), lb_step_execution step (Cons x s) -> lb_step_execution step s
always_monotonic : forall (T : Type) (P Q : infseq T -> Prop), (forall s : infseq T, P s -> Q s) -> forall s : infseq T, always P s -> always Q s
always1_always : forall (T : Type) (P : T -> Prop) (s : infseq T), always1 P s -> always (now P) s
always_always1 : forall (T : Type) (P : T -> Prop) (s : infseq T), always (now P) s -> always1 P s
Always : forall (T : Type) (P : infseq T -> Prop) (s : infseq T), P s -> always P (tl s) -> always P s
lb_step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P0 : list name * ordered_network -> label -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P0 p l p0 l0
lb_step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P0 : list name * ordered_network -> label -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P0 p l p0 l0

step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P0 : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P0 p p0 l
always_inv : forall (T : Type) (inv : infseq T -> Prop), (forall (x : T) (s : infseq T), inv (Cons x s) -> inv s) -> forall s : infseq T, inv s -> always inv s
always_Cons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : infseq T) (P : infseq T -> Prop), always P (Cons x s) -> P (Cons x s) /\ always P s
always_tl : forall (T : Type) (s : infseq T) (P : infseq T -> Prop), always P s -> always P (tl s)
always_invar : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : infseq T) (P : infseq T -> Prop), always P (Cons x s) -> always P s
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (new_msg_params : NewMsgParams multi_params) (fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams multi_params) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_ordered_dynamic_failure : forall (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P), NameOverlayParams multi_params -> NewMsgParams multi_params -> FailMsgParams multi_params -> step_relation (list name * ordered_dynamic_network) (name * (input + output)) Arguments step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star {P multi_params overlay_params new_msg_params fail_msg_params}
step_1_ind : forall P0 : data -> data -> list (input * output) -> Prop, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> P0 s s' [(i, out)]) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input * output)), step_1 d d0 l -> P0 d d0 l where ?P : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- OneNodeParams ?P]
step_1_sind : forall P0 : data -> data -> list (input * output) -> SProp, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> P0 s s' [(i, out)]) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input * output)), step_1 d d0 l -> P0 d d0 l where ?P : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- OneNodeParams ?P]
StepOrderedFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) h d |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr
step_s_sind : forall P0 : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> SProp, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P0 s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l -> P0 d d0 l where ?P : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- SingleParams ?P]
step_s_ind : forall P0 : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> Prop, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P0 s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l -> P0 d d0 l where ?P : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- SingleParams ?P]
always_and_tl : forall (T : Type) (P Q : infseq T -> Prop) (s : infseq T), always P s -> always Q s -> always (P /\_ Q) s
StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr
weak_until_always_not_always : forall (T : Type) (J P : infseq T -> Prop) (s : infseq T), weak_until J P s -> always (~_ P) s -> always J s
Cons_lb_step_exec : forall (A L trace : Type) (step : lb_step_relation A L trace) (e e' : event A L trace) (tr : list trace) (s : infseq (event A L trace)), step (evt_a e) (evt_l e) (evt_a e') tr -> evt_trace e' = evt_trace e ++ tr -> lb_step_execution step (Cons e' s) -> lb_step_execution step (Cons e (Cons e' s))
trace_non_empty_out = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (e : name * (input + list output)) => let (_, s) := e in match s with | inr [] => None | _ => Some e end : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), name * (input + list output) -> option (name * (input + list output)) Arguments trace_non_empty_out {P params}
eventually_always_cumul : forall (T : Type) (s : infseq T) (P Q : infseq T -> Prop), eventually P s -> always Q s -> eventually (P /\_ always Q) s
SST_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> step_s s s' tr where ?P : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- BaseParams] ?params : [P : BaseParams labeled_multi_params : LabeledMultiParams P overlay_params : NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params |- SingleParams ?P]
always_always : forall (T : Type) (P : infseq T -> Prop) (s : infseq T), always P s -> always (always P) s
eventually_ind : forall (T : Type) (P P0 : infseq T -> Prop), (forall s : infseq T, P s -> P0 s) -> (forall (x : T) (s : infseq T), eventually P s -> P0 s -> P0 (Cons x s)) -> forall i : infseq T, eventually P i -> P0 i
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_sind : forall P0 : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P0 (failed, net) (failed, net') []) -> (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic...
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_ind : forall P0 : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P0 (failed, net) (failed, net') []) -> (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network)...
CoInductive weak_until (T : Type) (J P : infseq T -> Prop) : infseq T -> Prop := W0 : forall s : infseq T, P s -> weak_until J P s | W_tl : forall s : infseq T, J s -> weak_until J P (tl s) -> weak_until J P s Arguments weak_until [T]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope Arguments W0 _%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope Arguments W_tl _%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
recons : forall (T : Type) (s : infseq T), Cons (hd s) (tl s) = s
Inductive eventually (T : Type) (P : infseq T -> Prop) : infseq T -> Prop := E0 : forall s : infseq T, P s -> eventually P s | E_next : forall (x : T) (s : infseq T), eventually P s -> eventually P (Cons x s) Arguments eventually [T]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments E0 _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments E_next _%type_scope _%function_scope
eventually_not_always : forall (T : Type) (P : infseq T -> Prop) (s : infseq T), eventually (~_ P) s -> ~ always P s
not_eventually_always_not : forall (T : Type) (P : infseq T -> Prop) (s : infseq T), ~ eventually P s -> always (~_ P) s

intros s H1 H2. 
renv. 
specialize (always_and_tl _ _ _ _ H1 H2) as H.
renv -H.
